author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four buffaloes that were crossing the railway tracks at the Fort railway station were hit by a speeding train on Saturday.

One of them died on the spot while the others suffered serious injuries.

“The one that died was found shredded to pieces near the railway tracks,” said Dawn William from Blue Cross.

Volunteers from the Blue Cross brought along their hydraulic ambulance to lift the wounded animals.“We managed to take the buffaloes to the hospital in time,” he said.
title: Four buffaloes hit by train, one dies
